about.text1: I am an Angular Frontend Developer.
about.text2: I am a career changer in this professional field, but have previously created websites privately and worked with HTML, CSS, Javascript and PHP.
about.text3: In 2019 I took online courses to get started professionally in website and mobile app development. For this, I worked through courses about Angular and Ionic.
about.text4: Since then I have been working as a freelancer for two companies,
about.text6: I am responsible for the further and new development of complex websites and mobile apps using Angular and Ionic.
about.text7: During this work, I dealt with CSS frameworks Bootstrap and Tailwinds and the Cypress test framework.
about.text8: Furthermore, I have knowledge of backend programming. I wrote some REST APIs using Node.js and NestJS.
about.text9: I speak excellent English and advanced Croatian. But my mother tongue is German.
about.text10: I am married and have a child.
